inputs.title: Question 1
inputs.value: Where did you hear about MyRumah?

inputs.title: Answer 1
inputs.value: News Paper,Radio,TV Ad,FB,Website,Others

inputs.title: Question 2
inputs.value: Do you intend to buy a property in next 6 months? If Yes, what is your budget for monthly investment?

inputs.title: Answer 2
inputs.value: 500 below,1000 below,1500 below,2000 below

inputs.title: Question 3
inputs.value: Do you intend to buy for Own Stay or Investment?

inputs.title: Answer 3
inputs.value: Own Stay,Investment

inputs.title: Question 4
inputs.value: What type of Property interests you?

inputs.title: Answer 4
inputs.value: Bungalow,Link House,Condo,Studio,SOHO,Others

inputs.title: Question 5
inputs.value: What is your targeted property value for your preferred property?

inputs.title: Answer 5
inputs.value: RM 1mil and below,RM 750.000 and below,RM 500.000 and below,RM 250.000 and below

inputs.title: Question 6
inputs.value: In which region do you prefer to own a property?

inputs.title: Answer 6
inputs.value: Northern,Central,Southern,East Coast

inputs.title: Question 7
inputs.value: What type of property topics are you interested in?

inputs.title: Answer 7
inputs.value: Strategy & Tips to invest,How to get loan approval successfully,Tenant Management,Real Property Gain Tax,Mortgage Reduction,Interior Design,Lease To Own,Others

inputs.title: Question 8
inputs.value: What is the most important factor in your buying decision ?

inputs.title: Answer 8
inputs.value: Low Down payment,Location,Reputation of Developer,Concept of Project,Competitive Selling Price,Reputation of Designer,Guaranteed Return of investment
